calculations.name: Term Label USD Formatting
calculations.formula:
if [TERM_LABEL]="3 Month" or [TERM_LABEL]="EDC1" or [TERM_LABEL]="3M Cash" or [TERM_LABEL]="EDC2"  or [TERM_LABEL]="EDC3" then 1
else if [TERM_LABEL] ="EDC5"   or [TERM_LABEL]="EDC4" or [TERM_LABEL]="EDC6"  then 2
else if  [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC9"   or [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC10"  or [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC8" or [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC7" then 3
else if [TERM_LABEL] ="EDC13"  or [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC14" or [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC11" or [TERM_LABEL]= "EDC12" then 4

else 5 end end END END

calculations.name: Market Title
calculations.formula:
// Created by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau
// Updated on 10/13/2017 by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau
// Current field is not being updated in RWH Market Dim. This is to make sure we do not have null values. This field replace some of the null values in RWH with the logical Market Title RWH for each curve.
// Originally intended for IR curves. Also applied to Inflation curves and Vol. surfaces.

IF ISNULL([MARKET_TITLE]) THEN
//Major Curve            
    IF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"Mid") THEN
        IF LEFT([MARKET_NAME],1)="s" AND LEN([MARKET_NAME])=7 THEN
            CASE REPLACE(REPLACE([MARKET_NAME],"Mid",""),"s","")
            WHEN "USO" THEN "Major USD"
            WHEN "CBO" THEN "Major CAD"
            WHEN "EBO" THEN "Major EUR"
            WHEN "GBO" THEN "Major GBP"
            ELSE "Major "+REPLACE(REPLACE([MARKET_NAME],"Mid",""),"s","")
            END
//CCIRS
        ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"USDs") AND CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"USDMid") THEN
            "CCIRS " + REPLACE(REPLACE([MARKET_NAME],"USDs",""),"USDMid","") + " Basis"

///Exceptions
        
        //ELSEIF ([Market Name RWH]="CHFsCHF6mMid") THEN "6m CHF Basis"
        //ELSEIF ([Market Name RWH]="USDsUSD12mMid") THEN "12m USD Basis"
        //ELSEIF ([Market Name RWH]="sNZD1mMid") THEN "1m NZD Basis"
        ELSEIF ([MARKET_NAME]="USDsUSDCUPOMMid") THEN "3m USD CUPOM Basis"
        ELSEIF ([MARKET_NAME]="EURsEURLibor-6mMid") THEN "6m EUR Libor Basis"

// Vol Surface
        ELSEif LEFT([MARKET_NAME],1)="f" then
            if CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"swpnN") then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " Normal Swaption Vol"
            elseif CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"swpn") then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " Swaption Vol"
            elseif CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"SABRN") then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " Normal SABR Vol"
            elseif CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"SABR") then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " SABR Vol"
            elseif CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"cap") and CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"1mNMid")  then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " Normal 1M CAP Vol"
            elseif CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"cap") and CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"NMid")  then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " Normal CAP Vol"
            elseif CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"cap") then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " CAP Vol"
            else "ERR"
            END

//Minor 1m,3m,6m,12m   
        ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"1m") and CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"Mid")then "1m " + left([MARKET_NAME],3)+ " Basis"
        ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"3") and CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"Mid") then "3m " + left([MARKET_NAME],3)+ " Basis"
        ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"6") and CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"Mid") then "6m " + left([MARKET_NAME],3)+ " Basis"
        ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"12") and CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"Mid") then "12m " + left([MARKET_NAME],3)+ " Basis"
        ELSE [MARKET_NAME]

        END

//Other Vol surface
    ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"skew") then mid([MARKET_NAME],2,3) + " Swaption Skew Vol"
    ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_NAME],"IR ") THEN REPLACE([MARKET_NAME],"IR ", "Major ")
    ELSE [MARKET_NAME]
    END
ELSEIF CONTAINS([MARKET_TITLE],"Eur") THEN REPLACE([MARKET_TITLE],"Eur","EUR")
ELSE [MARKET_TITLE]
END
